messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Slicing rifle barrels-------dicing easier ! Murf
messages.msgSnippet: I solved the problem.  It is easier to dice them.   I took a hack saw, cut off the top half.  I put it in a Ron Popeil dicer.....took only two or three
messages.messageBody:
I solved the problem. It is easier to dice them. I took a hack saw, cut
off the top half. I put it in a Ron Popeil dicer.....took only two or three
minutes. Mixed in some salsa sauce, and got my iron needs for a year. The only
problem was I needed a tooth pick for the pieces in between my teeth. Good
luck! Prof Murf


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
